command_list.command: item replace entity @s weapon.offhand with minecraft:air

item replace entity @s weapon.mainhand with minecraft:diamond_sword{Enchantments:[{id:"miningblock:freezing",lvl:3}],incendium:{item:"chilling_blade"},CustomModelData:1450003,display:{Name:'{"text":"冰霜——钻石剑","color":"#0088FF"}'}}

item replace entity @s weapon.mainhand with minecraft:netherite_sword{Enchantments:[{id:"miningblock:freezing",lvl:3}],incendium:{item:"greatsword_of_sacrifice"},CustomModelData:1450004,display:{Name:'{"text":"献祭——下界合金剑","color":"#FF0000"}'},"quark:RuneAttached":1b,"quark:RuneColor": {id:"quark:brown_rune",Count:1b}}

item replace entity @s weapon.offhand with minecraft:diamond_sword{Enchantments:[{id:"miningblock:freezing",lvl:3}],incendium:{item:"chilling_blade"},CustomModelData:1450003,display:{Name:'{"text":"冰霜——钻石剑","color":"#0088FF"}'}}
execute as @s at @s run playsound minecraft:entity.evoker.prepare_summon block @p[distance=..16] ~ ~ ~ 10 1.5
execute at @s as @p run playsound ba_bt:entity.golem.charge block @p[distance=..16] ~ ~ ~ 2
execute as @p at @s run playsound cataclysm:flame_burst block @p ~ ~ ~ 1.5
execute as @p at @s run playsound ba_bt:entity.golem.death block @p ~ ~ ~ 1 0.8
execute as @s at @s run summon mowziesmobs:sunstrike ~ ~ ~
execute as @s at @s run summon mowziesmobs:sunstrike ~ ~ ~
